dc:title: On Pilgrimage - March/April 1975
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Says the Catholic Worker is a school where volunteers can learn their vocation and to overcome fear. Notes prisoners of conscience, being jailed eleven times, visiting prisoners, and the witness of the Little Sisters of the Poor. Keywords: prison
